body:
This PR adds [Config File Variables](https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/configuration.html#config-file-variables) to `config.yaml:extensions` paths.

I'd like to see it cherry-picked for v0.15, if you don't mind, because it looked like a bug the first time I tried to use variables there.

I did my best to find all the places where the 'extensions' config was used. And factorized it.

I arbitrarily used `spack.util.path.canonicalize_path` instead of `substitute_path_variables`: not sure which is best.
title: Support config variables in config.yaml extensions paths
